Wednesday, Barmûde 11. I have verified it, and praise be often to God.
Dînâr
In the name of God, the Compassionate, the Merciful. 1/2+1/8+1/3 carat
The heirs of ʿUkâša have paid of the land-tax
for what belongs to them on the ḫarâǧî-grounds of al-Ušmûnain for the ḫarâǧî-
year four hundred and four, of gold coins one half and one eighth and two
ḥabbas by the hand of Bqâm b. Šanûda, the paymaster, in
Šawwâl of the year five.
